Content: I play Minecraft switch edition and the game freezes for a few seconds every half a minute_ maybe less.
I don't lose any progress. It just freezes for up to 10 seconds completely randomly. It almost feels as if the game is turn based.
I play on all of the above. It freezes no matter what.
This happens to my friend as well
I guess I could reinstall all of the updates
Tried playing and its really frustrating
